diff --git a/package.json b/package.json
index a7b5131..23260cc 100644
--- a/package.json
+++ b/package.json
@@ -14,7 +14,7 @@
     "@sentry/node": "^5.7.1",
     "@types/http-proxy": "^1.17.0",
     "@types/uuid": "^3.4.5",
-    "firebase": "^8.4.2",
+    "firebase": "^10.11.0",
     "http-proxy": "^1.17.0",
     "slack": "^11.0.2",
     "typescript": "^3.6.4",
diff --git a/src/db.ts b/src/db.ts
index dbd5caf..8b2b258 100644
--- a/src/db.ts
+++ b/src/db.ts
@@ -1,4 +1,4 @@
-import firebase from 'firebase'
+import { database } from '@firebase/app'
 import { firebaseConfig } from './config'
 import { dePromiseLike } from './utils'
 
@@ -79,12 +79,12 @@ export async function removeLink(
   workspace: string,
   link: Pick<GSLink, 'github'> | Pick<GSLink, 'slack'>,
 ) {
-  const query: firebase.database.Query = getLinkQuery(workspace, link)
+  const query: database.Query = getLinkQuery(workspace, link)
 
   const snapshot = await query.limitToFirst(1).once('value')
   if (snapshot.exists()) {
     const promisesOfRemove: Promise<ExpectedAny>[] = []
-    snapshot.forEach(child => {
+    snapshot.forEach((child: database.DataSnapshot) => {
       promisesOfRemove.push(child.ref.remove())
     })
     return Promise.all(promisesOfRemove)
